articles.title: Harmanpreet Kaur To Lead India As BCCI Names Women's Squads For ENG & AUS Series - OneCricket
articles.description: Harmanpreet Kaur is set to assume her leadership role for the Indian Women's team in their forthcoming home series against England and Australia. Earlier this year, the cricketer was handed a brief ban by the International Cricket Council (ICC), thus restrict…
articles.content:
Smriti Mandhana with Indian skipper Harmanpreet Kaur (x.com)
